bot_config {"Prefix": "$"}
insert_channel {"id": 1, "user_id": 1, "name": "foobar", "prefix": "+", "bot_name": "hortbot", "active": true}

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+prefix !
send hortbot #foobar [HB] prefix changed to !

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+prefix reset
no_send

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!prefix reset
send hortbot #foobar [HB] prefix reset to $

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :$prefix
send hortbot #foobar [HB] prefix is $
